title: Easy Shiny Debugging with ESCKEY
text: Relax grab cold one Esky: ’s easy debug shiny simple key press.

title: Easy Shiny Debugging with ESCKEY
text: can install development version esckey like :

title: Easy Shiny Debugging with ESCKEY
text: Add two functions esckey UI (escUI()) server (escServer(= input, o = output)) run app. Hit Esc running browse. Nice. Extremely cool Flaticon provided KonkappHex Sticker made Hexmake
code: library(shiny) library(esckey)  ui <- fluidPage(   "Hit Esc to browse",     numericInput("num",                  label = "Number",                  value = 2),     textInput("text",               "Text",               value = "Placeholder"),  escUI() ) server <- function(input, output, session) {   foo <- "bar"   escServer(i = input,             o = output,             foo = foo) }  shinyApp(ui, server)

title: escServer — escServer
